targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average CPU percentage of a Docker container has achieved > 50% for over 5 minutes.
alert.name: Docker Container CPU Usage alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE ("docker.group" =~ /^()$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name" fill(none)

SELECT mean("usage") FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE ("docker.group" =~ /^()$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name" ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 15 fill(none)

SELECT last("usage") AS "Memory Usage", last("usage_percent") AS "Memory %" FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE ("docker.group" =~ /^()$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "container_name" ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cached") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("buffered") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("free") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("rss") AS "Memory (RSS)", last("vms") AS "Memory (VMS)", last("cpu_usage") AS "CPU %" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pid", "process_name" ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 30

panels.title: Top 30 System Processes by Memory (RSS) - Requires procstat plugin

targets.query: SELECT last("n_cpus") FROM "docker" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("n_containers_running") AS "running", last("n_containers_paused") AS "paused", last("n_containers_stopped") AS "stopped" FROM "docker" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("n_images") FROM "docker" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

alert.message: OMV Docker host has reach > 80% CPU load for a time perioud of 5 minutes. Watch out!
alert.name: CPU Usage alert

targets.query: SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(processes_forked),1s) as forks FROM "kernel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as short,mean(load5) as medium,mean(load15) as long FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'k10temp-pci-00c3') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "chip" fill(null)

SELECT mean("read_bytes") / 1024 / 1024 AS "Read MB/s", mean("write_bytes") / 1024 / 1024 AS "Write MB/s" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("name" =~ /$disk/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("reads") + mean("writes") AS "IOPS" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("name" =~ /$disk/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("bytes_sent") * 8 / 1000000 AS "Upload Mbps", mean("bytes_recv") * 8 / 1000000 AS "Download Mbps" FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /$netif/ OR "interface" = 'docker0' OR "interface" = 'tun0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)

SELECT mean("err_in") AS "Errors In", mean("err_out") AS "Errors Out", mean("drop_in") AS "Drops In", mean("drop_out") AS "Drops Out" FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /$netif/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /$mountpoint/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)

SELECT mean("used") / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS "Used GB", mean("free") / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS "Free GB" FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /$mountpoint/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("available") / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS "Available GB" FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("available") / mean("total")) * 100 AS "Available %" FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Network interface
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/
